citate: Stejarul nu crește pretitudindinea; buruienile, în tot locul.
Oamenii nu se deosebesc atât prin ceea ce zic, cât prin ceea ce fac.
Egalitatea nu există decât în matematică.
Adevărul este crud, dar numai el foloseşte.
Truth can only be found in one place: the code.
It is not enough for code to work.
The only way to go fast, is to go well.

articole.titlu: Agile software development: principles, patterns and practices

citate: Books are a uniquely portable magic.
Get busy living or get busy dying.
Monsters are real, and ghosts are real too. They live inside us, and sometimes, they win.
Good books don't give up all their secrets at once.
Fiction is the truth inside the lie.
Go then, there are other worlds than these.
